## Installation 
<Steps>
  <Step>
    ### CLI

    Run this command in terminal

    ```bash
    git clone https://github.com/Yourcodecollection/interior-design-show
    ```
  </Step>

  <Step>
    **Now all done now you can run the source code**
  </Step>
</Steps>

## All Set
